DialogueOption.Text: Hello, do you know of Gabriel Johan?

DialogueNode.Text: Yes I do, why do you ask?

DialogueOption.Text: I'm Alex from the ISC and would like to ask you a few questions regarding Gabriel if you don't mind.
How did you and Gabriel meet?
What type of person do you see Gabriel as?
That's alright, see you.
How did you and Gabriel meet?
Does Gabriel have any hobbies or things he particularly enjoys?
What kind of person is Gabriel?

DialogueNode.Text: We work in the neurology department at the hospital together. He's a very smart man, I look up to him a lot.

DialogueOption.Text: Do you know if he's involved in anything else apart from work?
What do you have to say about his attitube towards his work and peers?

DialogueNode.Text: We don't see him outside of work much but when we do talk, he often mentions the ShipStar charity.

DialogueOption.Text: Can you tell me more about this charity?
Are you involved in this charity too?

DialogueNode.Text: It seems to be a charity which supports local orphanages.

DialogueOption.Text: How long has he been supporting this charity?
Are you two involved in this charity together?

DialogueNode.Text: No, I don't have the time or the money.

DialogueOption.Text: Yeah that's understandable. Thankyou for your time.

DialogueNode.Text: I think it was around 6 years ago when he first started supporting it. I remember he took quite a long time off from work back then. I'm pretty sure he first mentioned it after he got back from his time off.

DialogueOption.Text: Why did he take a long time off work?
Does he have any hobbies he enjoys?

DialogueNode.Text: I'm not too sure sorry. I think it may have been something to do with his family, it was due to private reasons so none of us really know why.

DialogueOption.Text: Thankyou for answering my questions. See you.

DialogueNode.Text: Not that I know of. He is always preoccupied with his research, but I do see him looking at his family photos often and smiling during his breaks. They must give him a lot of strength when things get stressful.

DialogueOption.Text: Does he seem interested in any work events?
Is he involved in anything else apart from work?
Thankyou for you time sir. Good day.

DialogueNode.Text: He's a diligent worker and is polite to everyone. But he doesn't seem to socilise with others much, he's often working in the labs or his office.

DialogueOption.Text: Does he attend many work events?
What type of person do you see Gabriel as?

DialogueNode.Text: We offer him to join us but he always declines.

DialogueOption.Text: Any reason why?
Is he involved in anything else apart from work?

DialogueNode.Text: Now that I think of it, he used to come to work dinners and outing quite a lot and would bring his wife along too. I guess time changes people.

DialogueOption.Text: Thankyou for answering all my questions. It was very helpful.

DialogueNode.Text: He may be quiet and not talk much, but I think he's a really great guy! He's not really close with any of us in the department at work, but he's always around to lend a helping hand.

DialogueOption.Text: Thankyou for your time.

Dialogue.clue: Gabriel started supporting a charity for orphanages 6 years ago.
